meta.title: Implement email notification system with user preferences

task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 25 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Build email notification service for mentions and due date reminders with user-configurable preferences
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Add dependencies: lettre = { version = "0.11", features = ["tokio1-native-tls"] }, tera = "1.19" 2. Create domain/notification.rs with: - enum NotificationType { Mention, DueDateReminder, TaskAssigned } - struct NotificationPreferences { user_id, email_mentions, email_due_dates, email_assignments } 3. Add notification_preferences table to schema 4. Create infra/email.rs with: - struct EmailService { smtp_transport: SmtpTransport, templates: Tera } - async fn send_email(to: &str, subject: &str, template: &str, context: Context) 5. Create templates in templates/emails/: mention.html, due_date_reminder.html 6. Create infra/jobs/notification_job.rs: - Check tasks with due_date within 24 hours, send reminders - Run daily via tokio cron 7. On task assignment/mention, check user preferences and send email asynchronously 8. Configure SMTP via env vars: SMTP_HOST, SMTP_PORT, SMTP_USERNAME, SMTP_PASSWORD

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-25): Implement email notification system with user preferences

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Unit tests with mock SMTP, integration tests for preference checks, verify emails sent on task assignment, test due date reminder job, verify unsubscribe respects preferences
